file_content.text: We've landed on Dromund Kaas. Any sign we've been detected?
T7 = scanning area // Results = no enemy movement toward this position
Good for us, but the Republic fleet's getting blown to bits up there. We need to wrap this up fast.
I examined the coordinates Tol Braga gave you. The Emperor has gone to an ancient temple deep in the jungle. Access is highly restricted.
I'm sure you know a shortcut or two.
Not for you, I'll bet.
What do you know about this ancient temple?
Sounds like you've been there.
The Emperor built it. He imprisoned his enemies there for many centuries. It is a place of vast dark power.
If you don't have a way to get us inside there, I might kill you on general principle.
Be useful for once--or else.
One of the Emperor's private shuttles is not far from here. It has full security clearance to enter the temple.
Great. Now all we have to do is fight through a city full of bad guys trying to kill us.
Moving as a single unit will give away our objective. We could pair off and follow separate routes to the shuttle.
The rest of you will have better odds if I keep the enemy focused on me.
I'll clear your path.
Do not be overeager. You're the only one who can face the Emperor. If you die, our mission fails.
Shouldn't we leave someone guarding the ship, in case the enemy comes?
And abandon this vessel?
If Imperial forces find the ship unguarded, they will leave a token security force. We can easily dispatch it when we return.
The time for mercy is over. Everyone outside this ship deserves death. Give it to them.
Kill everyone you meet.
I'll bring extra ammo.
You all have the shuttle's coordinates. I recommend no one be late arriving there.
